name: Modern Jail Break
description:
Get ready to immerse yourself in the darkness of the fearful Attica Correctional Facility Prison, New York, known to be one of the brutal prisons on the planet earth. This prison is famous for its maximum security and brutal treatment. You have been sentenced to death for a murder of a woman. Only you know that you were not involved in this murder case and that you are innocent, but as you could not provide enough evidence the court of law sent you in this deadly prison.
Use your brain and solve this prison puzzle. Discover the ways of killing the guards and finding an escape after having their weapons. As soon as you start your action you would have a limited time to kill them and snatch the keys to open the jail gates. It is a modern Jail and to break the locks you need to be really smart. After escaping from here maybe you would get a chance to prove your innocence and spend a normal life. So run for your life and fight.

√ Use weapons for brutal attacking & to kill the guards
√ Escape from the prison
√ Hardcore stunt game
√ Targeted prison escape missions
√ Realistic environment experience
√ Real life sound effects
√ Visually attractive 3D environment
√ Cops vs Prisoner chase adventure missions
√ Realistic fighting physics
√ Immersive gameplay
